markdownRemark.html:
Apple showed off a new laptop today called the MacBook Pro. All I can say is I want one. It is four times faster than the current PowerBook, and features a dual core intel processor.

It will not ship for another six to eight weeks, but Apple is taking orders today. I wish Apple had done this two years ago when I bought my last laptop.

frontmatter.title: All I want is a MacBookPro
Amazon Web Services funkiness with BlueDragon.NET
